alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:24PM EDT until July 15 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DECATUR...EASTERN MILLER...SOUTHWESTERN BAKER AND EAST CENTRAL SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 723 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newton to near Chattahoochee, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Newton, Bainbridge, Brinson, Hanover, Ausmac, Babcock, Reynoldsville, Hoggard Mill, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Boykin, Hawkinstown, Cyrene, Mimsville, Cooktown, Bellview and Steinham Store. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
